functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Incendiary Scroll, Class 3\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"The Undead Crusaders created","color":"gray"}','{"text":"this scroll to spread fire quickly","color":"gray"}','{"text":"and easily amidst groups of","color":"gray"}','{"text":"undead, but explosives were always","color":"gray"}','{"text":"their preference.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Incinerate Nearby Foes","color":"gray"}']},HoldingID:71,Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:6,CustomModelData:19,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"generic.attackSpeed",Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUIDLeast:9946857,UUIDMost:-4678568,Slot:"mainhand"}]}
